018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.report;
019
020import static java.nio.file.Files.writeString;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.HIGH1;
023import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.HIGH2;
024import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.HIGH3;
025import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.LOW;
026import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.NORMAL;
027import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.NORMAL_HIGH;
028import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.OPTIMAL;
029import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat.HTML;
030import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat.HTML_EMBEDDED;
031import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat.TEXT;
032import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.ReportBase.DestinationType.DEST_FILE;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.CAPTION;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.TXT;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
037
038import java.io.File;
039import java.io.IOException;
040import java.sql.SQLException;
041import java.time.Duration;
042import java.time.LocalDate;
043import java.util.HashMap;
044import java.util.List;
045import java.util.Map;
046import java.util.SortedMap;
047import java.util.stream.Stream;
048
049import org.apiguardian.api.API;
050import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.DataNode;
051import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis;
052import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat;
053import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.ReportBase;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnsupportedEnumError;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Template;
057
058/**
059 *  An implementation of
060 *  {@link org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Report}
061 *  that provides a very basic report.
062 *
063 *  @version $Id: SimpleReport.java 151 2022-03-15 20:39:31Z tquadrat $
064 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065 *  @UMLGraph.link
066 *  @since 0.0.1
067 */
068@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SimpleReport.java 151 2022-03-15 20:39:31Z tquadrat $" )
069@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
070public final class SimpleReport extends ReportBase
071{
072        /*--------------*\
073    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
074        \*--------------*/
075    /**
076     *  Creates a new instance of {@code SimpleReport}.
077     */
078    public SimpleReport()
079    {
080        super( "SIMPLE", TEXT, HTML, HTML_EMBEDDED );
081    }   //  SimpleReport()
082
083        /*---------*\
084    ====** Methods **==========================================================
085        \*---------*/
086    /**
087     *  {@inheritDoc}
088     */
089    @Override
090    public final void generateReport( final File destination, final ReportFormat format ) throws IOException, SQLException
091    {
092        //---* Get the data *--------------------------------------------------
093        final int numberOfMeasuring;
094        final SortedMap<LocalDate, DataNode> data;
095        final Map<Diagnosis,DistributionNode> distribution;
096        try( final var connection = getConfiguration().retrieveConnection() )
097        {
098            final var totalData = loadData( connection, getConfiguration().getTimezone(), getConfiguration().getStartDate(), getConfiguration().getEndDate() );
099            numberOfMeasuring = totalData.size();
100            data = compressToDay( totalData );
101            distribution = distributeData( totalData );
102        }
103
104        final var firstDay = data.firstKey();
105        final var lastDay = data.lastKey();
106        final var duration = Duration.between( firstDay.atStartOfDay(), lastDay.plusDays( 1 ).atStartOfDay() );
107        final var totalDays = duration.toDays();
108        final var dayCount = data.size();
109
110        final var average = calculateAverage( data );
111        final var weightedAverage = calculateEndWeightedAverage( data );
112        final var median = calculateMedian( data );
113
114        //---* Gather the contents *-------------------------------------------
115        final Map<String,String> contents = new HashMap<>();
116        contents.put( "Language", getConfiguration().getLocale().getLanguage() );
117        contents.put( "Headline", retrieveText( TXT, "Headline" ) );
118        contents.put( "Name", getConfiguration().getName() );
119        contents.put( "Birthdate", getConfiguration().getBirthdate().toString() );
120        contents.put( "NameCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Name" ) );
121        contents.put( "FirstDay", firstDay.toString() );
122        contents.put( "FirstDayCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "FirstDay" ) );
123        contents.put( "LastDay", lastDay.toString() );
124        contents.put( "LastDayCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "LastDay" ) );
125        contents.put( "TotalDays", format( "% 4d", totalDays ) );
126        contents.put( "TotalDaysCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "TotalDays" ) );
127        contents.put( "DayCount", format( "% 4d", dayCount ) );
128        contents.put( "DayCountCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "DayCount" ) );
129        contents.put( "TotalCount", format( "% 4d", numberOfMeasuring ) );
130        contents.put( "TotalCountCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "TotalCount" ) );
131        contents.put( "TableHeader", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader" ) );
132        contents.put( "TableHeader1", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader1" ) );
133        contents.put( "TableHeader2", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader2" ) );
134        contents.put( "TableHeader3", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader3" ) );
135        contents.put( "TableHeader4", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader4" ) );
136        contents.put( "AverageCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Average" ) );
137        contents.put( "AverageSystolic", format( "% 3d", average.systolic() ) );
138        contents.put( "AverageDiastolic", format( "% 3d", average.diastolic() ) );
139        contents.put( "AveragePulsePressure", format( "% 3d", average.pulsePressure() ) );
140        contents.put( "AverageAssessment", assessData( average ).toString() );
141        contents.put( "WeightedAverageCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "WeightedAverage" ) );
142        contents.put( "WeightedAverageSystolic", format( "% 3d", weightedAverage.systolic() ) );
143        contents.put( "WeightedAverageDiastolic", format( "% 3d", weightedAverage.diastolic() ) );
144        contents.put( "WeightedAveragePulsePressure", format( "% 3d", weightedAverage.pulsePressure() ) );
145        contents.put( "WeightedAverageAssessment", assessData( weightedAverage ).toString() );
146        contents.put( "MedianCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Median" ) );
147        contents.put( "MedianSystolic", format( "% 3d", median.systolic() ) );
148        contents.put( "MedianDiastolic", format( "% 3d", median.diastolic() ) );
149        contents.put( "MedianPulsePressure", format( "% 3d", median.pulsePressure() ) );
150        contents.put( "MedianAssessment", assessData( median ).toString() );
151        contents.put( "DistributionCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Distribution" ) );
152        contents.put( "DistributionColumn1Header", retrieveText( CAPTION, "DistributionColumn1" ) );
153        contents.put( "DistributionColumn2Header", retrieveText( CAPTION, "DistributionColumn2" ) );
154        contents.put( "Disclaimer", retrieveText( TXT, "Disclaimer" ) );
155
156        final var maxLenDiagnosisText = Stream.of( LOW, OPTIMAL, NORMAL, NORMAL_HIGH, HIGH1, HIGH2, HIGH3 )
157            .map( Diagnosis::toString )
158            .mapToInt( String::length )
159            .max()
160            .orElse( 0 );
161        final var diagFormat = format( "%%%ds", maxLenDiagnosisText );
162
163        contents.put( "Diag_Filler", " ".repeat( maxLenDiagnosisText ) );
164
165        for( final var diag : List.of( LOW, OPTIMAL, NORMAL, NORMAL_HIGH, HIGH1, HIGH2, HIGH3 ) )
166        {
167            final var node = distribution.computeIfAbsent( diag, DistributionNode::new );
168            contents.put( format( "Diag_%s", diag.name() ), format( diagFormat, diag.toString() ) );
169            contents.put( format( "Diag_%s_SystolicPercent", diag.name() ), format( "% 5.1f%%", node.getSystolicPercentage() ) );
170            contents.put( format( "Diag_%s_SystolicCount", diag.name() ), format( "% 4d", node.getSystolicCount() ) );
171            contents.put( format( "Diag_%s_DiastolicPercent", diag.name() ), format( "% 5.1f%%", node.getDiastolicPercentage() ) );
172            contents.put( format( "Diag_%s_DiastolicCount", diag.name() ), format( "% 4d", node.getDiastolicCount() ) );
173        }
174
175        //---* Create the output *---------------------------------------------
176        switch( format )
177        {
178            case TEXT -> generateTextReport( destination, contents );
179            case HTML, HTML_EMBEDDED -> generateHTMLReport( destination, contents );
180            default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( format );
181        }
182    }   //  generateReport()
183
184    /**
185     *  Generates the report in
186     *  {@link ReportFormat#HTML}
187     *  or
188     *  {@link ReportFormat#HTML_EMBEDDED}
189     *  format.
190     *
191     *  @param destination  The output file.
192     *  @param contents The map with the report data.
193     *  @throws IOException An error occurred while writing to the destination.
194     */
195    private final void generateHTMLReport( final File destination, final Map<String,String> contents ) throws IOException
196    {
197        final var targetFile = checkDestination( destination, DEST_FILE );
198        final var template = new Template(
199            """
200                <!DOCTYPE html>
201                <html lang="${Language}">
202                  <head>
203                    <meta charset="utf-8">
204                    <title>${Headline} ${NameCaption} ${Name} (${Birthdate})</title>
205                  </head>
206                  <body>
207                  <h1>${Headline}</h1>
208                  <p>${NameCaption} <b>${Name}</b> (${Birthdate})</p>
209                  <hr>
210                  <table>
211                    <tr>
212                      <th>${FirstDayCaption}:</th><td>${FirstDay}</td>
213                    </tr>
214                    <tr>
215                      <th>${LastDayCaption}:</th><td>${LastDay}</td>
216                    </tr>
217                  </table>
218                  <br>
219                  <table>
220                    <tr>
221                      <th>${TotalCountCaption}:</th><td align="right">${TotalCount}</td>
222                    </tr>
223                    <tr>
224                      <th>${TotalDaysCaption}:</th><td align="right">${TotalDays}</td>
225                    </tr>
226                    <tr>
227                      <th>${DayCountCaption}:</th><td align="right">${DayCount}</td>
228                    </tr>
229                  </table>
230                  <br>
231                  <table border="1">
232                    <thead>
233                      <tr>
234                        <th/>
235                        <th>${TableHeader1}</th>
236                        <th>${TableHeader2}</th>
237                        <th>${TableHeader3}</th>
238                        <th>${TableHeader4}</th>
239                      </tr>
240                    </thead>
241                    <tbody>
242                      <tr>
243                        <th>${AverageCaption}</th>
244                        <td align="right">${AverageSystolic}</td>
245                        <td align="right">${AverageDiastolic}</td>
246                        <td align="right">${AveragePulsePressure}</td>
247                        <td>${AverageAssessment}</td>
248                      </tr>
249                      <tr>
250                        <th>${WeightedAverageCaption}</th>
251                        <td align="right">${WeightedAverageSystolic}</td>
252                        <td align="right">${WeightedAverageDiastolic}</td>
253                        <td align="right">${WeightedAveragePulsePressure}</td>
254                        <td>${WeightedAverageAssessment}</td>
255                      </tr>
256                      <tr>
257                        <th>${MedianCaption}</th>
258                        <td align="right">${MedianSystolic}</td>
259                        <td align="right">${MedianDiastolic}</td>
260                        <td align="right">${MedianPulsePressure}</td>
261                        <td>${MedianAssessment}</td>
262                      </tr>
263                    </tbody>
264                  </table>
265                  <br>
266                  <h2>${DistributionCaption}</h2>
267                  <table border="1">
268                    <thead>
269                      <tr>
270                        <th/>
271                        <th colspan="3">${DistributionColumn1Header}</th>
272                        <th colspan="3">${DistributionColumn2Header}</th>
273                      </tr>
274                    </thead>
275                    <tbody>
276                      <tr>
277                        <th>${Diag_LOW}</th>
278                        <td align="right">(&lt; 105)</td>
279                        <td align="right">${Diag_LOW_SystolicPercent}</td>
280                        <td align="right">${Diag_LOW_SystolicCount}</td>
281                        <td align="right">(&lt; 65)</td>
282                        <td align="right">${Diag_LOW_DiastolicPercent}</td>
283                        <td align="right">${Diag_LOW_DiastolicCount}</td>
284                      </tr>
285                      <tr>
286                        <th>${Diag_OPTIMAL}</th>
287                        <td align="right">(105-119)</td>
288                        <td align="right">${Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicPercent}</td>
289                        <td align="right">${Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicCount}</td>
290                        <td align="right">(65-79)</td>
291                        <td align="right">${Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicPercent}</td>
292                        <td align="right">${Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicCount}</td>
293                      </tr>
294                      <tr>
295                        <th>${Diag_NORMAL}</th>
296                        <td align="right">(120-129)</td>
297                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_SystolicPercent}</td>
298                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_SystolicCount}</td>
299                        <td align="right">(80-84)</td>
300                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicPercent}</td>
301                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicCount}</td>
302                      </tr>
303                      <tr>
304                        <th>${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH}</th>
305                        <td align="right">(130-139)</td>
306                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicPercent}</td>
307                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicCount}</td>
308                        <td align="right">(85-89)</td>
309                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicPercent}</td>
310                        <td align="right">${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicCount}</td>
311                      </tr>
312                      <tr>
313                        <th>${Diag_HIGH1}</th>
314                        <td align="right">(140-159)</td>
315                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH1_SystolicPercent}</td>
316                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH1_SystolicCount}</td>
317                        <td align="right">(90-99)</td>
318                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicPercent}</td>
319                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicCount}</td>
320                      </tr>
321                      <tr>
322                        <th>${Diag_HIGH2}</th>
323                        <td align="right">(160-179)</td>
324                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH2_SystolicPercent}</td>
325                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH2_SystolicCount}</td>
326                        <td align="right">(100-109)</td>
327                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicPercent}</td>
328                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicCount}</td>
329                      </tr>
330                      <tr>
331                        <th>${Diag_HIGH3}</th>
332                        <td align="right">(&gt;= 180)</td>
333                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH3_SystolicPercent}</td>
334                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH3_SystolicCount}</td>
335                        <td align="right">(&gt;= 110)</td>
336                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicPercent}</td>
337                        <td align="right">${Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicCount}</td>
338                      </tr>
339                    </tbody>
340                  </table>
341                  <br>
342                  <p>${Disclaimer}</p>
343                  </body>
344                </html>
345                """
346        );
347        writeString( targetFile, template.replaceVariable( contents ), UTF8 );
348    }   //  generateHTMLReport()
349
350    /**
351     *  Generates the report in
352     *  {@link ReportFormat#TEXT}
353     *  format.
354     *
355     *  @param destination  The output file.
356     *  @param contents The map with the report data.
357     *  @throws IOException An error occurred while writing to the destination.
358     */
359    private final void generateTextReport( final File destination, final Map<String,String> contents ) throws IOException
360    {
361        final var targetFile = checkDestination( destination, DEST_FILE );
362        final var template = new Template(
363            """
364                ${Headline}
365                
366                ${NameCaption} ${Name} (${Birthdate})
367                
368                -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
369                            
370                ${FirstDayCaption}: ${FirstDay}
371                ${LastDayCaption}: ${LastDay}
372                            
373                ${TotalCountCaption}: ${TotalCount}
374                ${TotalDaysCaption}: ${TotalDays}
375                ${DayCountCaption}: ${DayCount}
376                            
377                                               ${TableHeader}
378                ${AverageCaption}:   ${AverageSystolic}         ${AverageDiastolic}          ${AveragePulsePressure}          ${AverageAssessment}
379                ${WeightedAverageCaption}:   ${WeightedAverageSystolic}         ${WeightedAverageDiastolic}          ${WeightedAveragePulsePressure}          ${WeightedAverageAssessment}
380                ${MedianCaption}:   ${MedianSystolic}         ${MedianDiastolic}          ${MedianPulsePressure}          ${MedianAssessment}
381                
382                ${DistributionCaption}
383                ${Diag_Filler}  ${DistributionColumn1Header} ${DistributionColumn2Header}
384                ${Diag_LOW}  (< 105)    ${Diag_LOW_SystolicPercent}   (< 65)    ${Diag_LOW_DiastolicPercent}
385                ${Diag_OPTIMAL}  (105-119)  ${Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicPercent}   (65-79)   ${Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicPercent}
386                ${Diag_NORMAL}  (120-129)  ${Diag_NORMAL_SystolicPercent}   (80-84)   ${Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicPercent}
387                ${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH}  (130-139)  ${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicPercent}   (85-89)   ${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicPercent}
388                ${Diag_HIGH1}  (140-159)  ${Diag_HIGH1_SystolicPercent}   (90-99)   ${Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicPercent}
389                ${Diag_HIGH2}  (160-179)  ${Diag_HIGH2_SystolicPercent}   (100-109) ${Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicPercent}
390                ${Diag_HIGH3}  (>= 180)   ${Diag_HIGH3_SystolicPercent}   (>= 110)  ${Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicPercent}
391                
392                ${Disclaimer}
393                """
394        );
395        writeString( targetFile, template.replaceVariable( contents ), UTF8 );
396    }   //  generateTextReport()
397}
398//  class SimpleReport
399
400/*
401 *  End of File
402 */
